data.name: Jakarta One Brazil
data.description:
About the Event This virtual event is a mix of expert talks, demos, and thought-provoking sessions focused on enterprise applications implemented using open source vendor-neutral Jakarta EE (successor of Java EE) and Eclipse MicroProfile specifications on Kubernetes.
